attributes.action: keep the rugby league challenge cup as a "crown jewel"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please keep the rugby league challenge cup as a "crown jewel" on tv..it is a northern game where rugby league started and where labour has its roots..not all people have or can afford sky and it is not fair to take this away..we do not all like football,cricket,athletics etc..i do, but i am probably in the minority..please think of the people in the north not just the south,,we all matter in this country
